title: Goal-Oriented Science Education Curriculum for Pre-Problem-Solving Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Core concepts of secondary science curriculum and experimental design experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing mobile app-based microlearning modules in a BYOD environment, with formative assessments providing real-time feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically activate at least three or more relevant prior knowledge areas when solving complex science problems
By setting specific learning goals, learners can achieve 80% or higher appropriateness (relevance) in problem-solving attempts
Through self-directed goal setting, learners can achieve a 20% or higher improvement in conceptual learning achievement

resources: Automated Grading System for Formative Assessments

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
